Summary: Starlike, seemed as though it was observing us.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the back yard with my friend on the trapoline. (im 13) and my friend tackled me. I looked straight up and saw a large light hovering. It was not a helicopter,star ectI knew immediatly it didnt look human like. I pointed and said look. My friend looked up and the light went off slowly and the U.F.O flew away with changing directions,speeds and altitudes. We lost sight of that ufo, but then we see 2 more hovering. this is where it gets weird. My friend, who was not dealing with this well screamed if your going to hurt us go up. The 2 simultaniously went down. We observed them for a good min. We were too scared and bailed, but before I went into my house, I noticed they definatly went up. I never lost sight of those two untill before i went to bed I looked and they were gone.
